briefdescription.para: A vector of weekly short-term ROFs for a utility taken as the max between the storage and treatment short-term ROFs.
A vector of weekly short-term storage ROFs for a utility.
A vector of weekly short-term treatment ROFs for a utility.
A vector of weekly long-term ROFs for a utility taken as the max between the storage and treatment long-term ROFs.
A vector of weekly long-term storage ROFs for a utility.
A vector of weekly long-term treatment ROFs for a utility.
A vector of weekly combined storage for a utility.
A vector of weekly unrestricted demand for a utility.
A vector of weekly restricted demand for a utility.
A vector of weekly cumulative contingency fund sizes for a utility.
A vector of weekly gross revenues for a utility.
A vector of weekly contingency fund contributions for a utility.
A vector of weekly debt service payments for a utility.
A vector of weekly present-valued debt service payments for a utility.
A vector of weekly insurance contract costs for a utility.
A vector of weekly insurance payouts received by a utility from the insurance company.
A vector of weekly drought mitigation costs for a utility.
A vector of weekly net present infrastructure costs for a utility.
A vector of weekly net present infrastructure costs for a utility.
A vector of weekly waste water discharge for a utility.
A vector of weekly unfulfilled demand for a utility.
A vector of weekly net stream inflow for a utility.
A vector of weekly total treatment capacity for a utility.
A vector of weekly final stored volume for a utility across all its water sources.
A vector of weekly recorded annual demand for a utility. This value stays constant for all weeks within the same year.
A vector of annual projected demand estimates for a utility.
A 2D vector of infrastructure pathways for a utility.
A pointer to the utility object that this data collector is collecting data for.
Constructs a UtilitiesDataCollector for managing and collecting data related to a specific utility. Initializes the data collector with utility-specific attributes.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Utility object for which the data collector is being created.
Unsigned long integer representing the realization ID.

briefdescription.para: Overloads the assignment operator for the UtilitiesDataCollector class, allowing assignment of one data collector to another. This operator performs a deep copy of the data collector's attributes.

detaileddescription.para: This function does not have an implementation in the .cpp file.

parameterdescription.para: A constant reference to the UtilitiesDataCollector object to be assigned.

simplesect.para: A reference to the updated UtilitiesDataCollector object after the assignment.

briefdescription.para: Generates a tabular string representation of utility data for a specified week. This includes data such as combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, and revenues.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the printTabularString function in the DataCollector class.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the week for which the tabular data is generated.

simplesect.para: A string containing the tabular representation of the utility data for the specified week.

briefdescription.para: Generates a compact, comma-delimited representation of utility data for a specified week. This includes data such as combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, and revenues.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the printCompactString function in the DataCollector class.

parameterdescription.para: Integer representing the week for which the tabular data is generated.

simplesect.para: A string containing the compact representation of the utility data for the specified week.

briefdescription.para: Generates the first header line for the tabular representation of utility data. This header provides general column titles for data such as combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, and revenues.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the printTabularStringHeaderLine1 function in the DataCollector class.

simplesect.para: A string containing the first header line for the tabular representation.

briefdescription.para: Generates the second header line for the tabular representation of utility data. This header provides general column titles for data such as combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, and revenues.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the printTabularStringHeaderLine2 function in the DataCollector class.

simplesect.para: A string containing the first header line for the tabular representation.

briefdescription.para: Generates the header line for the compact, comma-delimited representation of utility data. This header provides general column titles for data such as combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, and revenues.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the printCompactStringHeader function in the DataCollector class.

simplesect.para: A string containing the header line for the compact, comma-delimited representation.

briefdescription.para: Collects data for the utility and appends it to the respective data vectors. This includes combined storage, capacity, net inflow, ROFs, demand, insurance, contingency funds, debt service payments, revenues, and infrastructure net present costs.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the collect_data function in the DataCollector class.

simplesect.para: void

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of combined storage data collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the combined storage data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of storage capacity data collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the storage capacity data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of gross revenue data collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the gross revenue data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of contingency fund contribution data collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the contingency fund contribution data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of weekly debt service payments collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the weekly debt service payments made by the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of weekly insurance contract costs paid by the utility collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the weekly insurance contract costs paid by the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of drought mitigation costs paid by the utility collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the contingency fund contribution data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's net contingency fund sizes as it changes across all weeks collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the contingency fund size data for the utility.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the 2D vector of infrastructure pathways (infrastructure IDs and their associated realizations) build by the utility.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a 2D vector of integers a utility's infrastructure pathways.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's weekly net infrastructure net present cost collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's infrastructure net present cost.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's weekly short-term ROF collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's short-term ROF.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's weekly long-term ROF collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's long-term ROF.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's weekly volumetric restricted demand collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's weekly restricted demand.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's weekly volumetric unrestricted demand collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's weekly unrestricted demand.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of a utility's recorded (historical) annual demand collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's weekly restricted demand.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the vector of the present value of a utility's weekly debt service payments collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector.

simplesect.para: A constant reference to a vector of doubles containing the utility's weekly restricted demand.

briefdescription.para: Checks for NaN values in the most recent data entries collected by the UtilitiesDataCollector. Throws a runtime error if any NaN value is detected.

simplesect.para: void

parameterdescription.para: If a NaN value is detected in any of the data fields for the utility. Additionally, logs a warning if the net present infrastructure cost exceeds an absurdly high threshold.

briefdescription.para: The UtilitiesDataCollector class is a subclass of the DataCollector class that implements the data collection of Utility objects. It is the main subclass that results in the Utilities' output CSV files.
